original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court on the east side, and he measured the gate. It was of the same size as the others.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 안뜰 동쪽으로 가서 그 문간을 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court on the east side
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 나를 동쪽 안뜰로 인도했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was of the same size as the others
